name: GetTransfer Global
slogan: Providing our clients best travel experiences
description: GetTransfer is an online marketplace for transfers and transportation services. It provides the lowest prices for long-distance trips from airports, train stations and between cities. At the moment the company is present in more than 100 countries around the world.

jobs.title: B2B development manager
jobs.description:
Day to day duties imply establishing and managing new partnerships with B2B Operational Travelling Agents (OTA), online tickets booking operators, business travel service agencies and airlines. 
Working closely with our internal IT team to work out customized solutions for B2B clients, to help them to get the most of the services provided by us.
Person in this role should be ready for occasional business trips.
 
Requirements:
Ability to recognize opportunities, analyze market trends and opportunities and provide tactical business solutions. Ambitious, assertive with problem solving abilities and intensely focused on bottom-line results.
Previous experience in organizing B2B sales for digital startups especially related to Horeca sector is a plus. To succeed in this role successful candidate should gave certain knowledge and understanding of 
Horeca sector, business of OTAs, airlines, business travel service agencies and how segment of international transfers fits into their businesses.
Excellent negotiation skills/ International background, desire to work in a diverse and global business environment.
